body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack install p3dfft3 %gcc@10.3.0
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.2-3945-a81ec88c6c
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original


### Additional information

The package fails to compile with gcc 10+, apparently due to the 'argument mismatch' issue in some Fortran codes. The compiler flag `-fallow-argument-mismatch` is required.

[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7015236/spack-build-out.txt)
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7015245/spack-build-env.txt)
[config.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7015249/config.log)


### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: p3dfft3
